casebody.data:
Henry Wehle, as Receiver, &c., Respondent, v. Michael A. Coleman, et al., Appellants. Decided December 30, 1887. Appeal from judgment in favor of the plaintiff entered upon the decision of a judge at Special Term. Sewell, Pierce & Sheldon, for appellants. John Fennel, attorney, and Henry Wehle and Charles Goepp, of counsel for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., Freedman and Ingraham, JJ.

Opinion by Freedman, J.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
